about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My passion for digital art and creativity
about.name: Digital Artist
about.description1: I'm a passionate digital illustrator who transforms ideas and dreams into unique works of art. My passion for art started as a child and has evolved over time through study and experimentation with different digital techniques.
about.description2: Each project is an opportunity for me to tell a story, capture emotions, and create something truly special. I love working closely with my clients to bring their artistic visions to life.
